name: ui-test-visualizer
description: Visually step through your UI tests while debugging.
author: poffm

ui-test-visualizer.disableCodeLens.description: Disable the in-editor UI Test Visualizer buttons

ui-test-visualizer.codeLensSelector.description: Show the in-editor UI Test Visualizer buttons on files matching this pattern

ui-test-visualizer.testFramework.description: Test Framework: Vitest or Jest. Auto-detects by default by walking up directories from your test file.

scripts.build: rm -rf build-prod && pnpm run -r build && (cd build-prod && npx vsce package --allow-missing-repository --skip-license --out ./extension.vsix)
scripts.code-server-up: docker compose -f test/docker-compose.yml up -d && docker exec vscodeExtension code-server --install-extension /source/build-prod/extension.vsix
scripts.test:e2e: pnpm run code-server-up && playwright test && pnpm run code-server-down
